DADOS-GERAIS.NOME-EM-CITACOES-BIBLIOGRAFICAS: PREISSLER JUNIOR, S.;PREISSLER, SIGMUNDO;PREISSLER JUNIOR, SIGMUNDO

RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Ph.D. em Cincia da Computao pela Sapienza Universit di Roma (Itlia). Doutor em Engenharia e Gesto do Conhecimento pela UFSC. Mestre em Engenharia Eltrica - nfase em Inteligncia Artificial. Especialista em Redes de Computadores e Aplicaes para Web, Especialista em Metodologias e Gesto para EaD, Especialista em Docncia no Ensino Superior e Bacharel em informtica. Atua como Avaliador ad hoc do Ministrio da Educao (INEP), da Secretaria de Educao Profissional e Tecnolgica (MEC) e do Conselho Estadual de Educao (SC). Tem experincia nas reas de: Inteligncia de Mercado (BI) , Gesto com nfase em Projetos, Empreendedorismo e Inovao. Seu principal foco de pesquisa cientfica: Data Science, Smart Buildings, HVAC Systems, Control and Automation Systems, Model Checking, Knowledge-based Systems, R&D+i.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: Ph.D. in Computer Science at Sapienza University of Rome (Italy) and Ph.D. in Knowledge Engineering and Management at Federal University of Santa Catarina (Brazil). He is also an Appraiser of the Ministry of Education in BrazilI. He got his Master Degree in Electrical Engineering on Artificial Intelligence research area at University of the State of Santa Catarina. He is Specialist in Computer Networks and Web Applications, Specialist in Methodologies and Management in Distance Education as well as Bachelor in Computer Science. Has experience in Business Intelligence, Information Management with an emphasis on IT projects, Entrepreneurship and Innovation. His scientific research topics of interesting are: Smart Buildings, HVAC Systems, Control and Automation Systems, Model Checking, Knowledge-based Systems, R&D+i.
